# Maps and Geographic Applications

Planning and Development Maps and Geographic Applications provide data for learning about and analyzing land use and development in Fairfax County. These resources address several land use and development subject areas. They include: 

  * Current Zoning maps and applications 
  * Historic features 
  * Long range planning maps and applications



Additional online mapping applications created by Fairfax County can be found in the Interactive Map Gallery.

## Fairfax County Jade

Jade is a Geographic Information System (GIS) web application that provides an easy way to view, search, and analyze geographic information.

  * One map application, available on any device, with over 170 layers to view, combine and analyze.
  * Detailed property reports, especially useful for land development.
  * Save, share and print your map creations.
  * Current and historical aerial imagery, viewable from multiple angles.



Launch Fairfax County Jade

  


## Planning & Zoning Viewer

An interactive map which provides information about current zoning applications and associated zoning layers for areas with in Fairfax County. The application will allow you to find information related to planning & zoning activities, toggle layers on and off, change the underlying base map, measure distances and areas, draw and customize the map, and create a custom map output for printing.

Planning & Zoning Viewer Map

  


## Comprehensive Landuse Plan Map Tool

A geographic representation of the document that is used by the Board of Supervisors, Planning Commission, county staff and the public to guide land use, transportation and public facility decision making. The map includes layers such as planned land uses, special areas, and existing & future transportation features.

Comprehensive Landuse Plan Map Tool

  


## Zoning District Analyzer

An interactive map of existing zoning districts with in Fairfax County. This map enables the ability to toggle on/off each zoning district with in Fairfax County.

Zoning District Analyzer

  


## Reston Snapshots

The Reston Snapshots site conveys information on various topics related to the evolution of the Transit-Oriented Development (TOD) areas into active transit and pedestrian-oriented neighborhoods with high quality public open spaces.

Reston Snapshots Project

  


## Tysons Tracker

The Tysons Tracker is an interactive platform providing the same data, analysis, and updates as the former hard-copy Tysons Annual Reports. Explore the site that is made up of stories, maps, graphs & charts that monitor the comprehensive plan implementation.

Tysons Tracker
